    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      XMLRead()
      The constructor only initializes intRecNum equal to a minus one.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int find(java.lang.String strKeyName, java.lang.String strKeyContents)
      This function will search for a value represented by strKey in a field indicated by strKeyField.
      java.lang.String getField(java.lang.String strFieldName)
      This method extracts the contents of the field at the the current intRecNum position.
      java.lang.String getField(java.lang.String strField, int intRec)
      This method sets the current record to intRec and then extracts the contents of that field at that record.
      int getRecordCount(java.lang.String strFieldName)
      This method returns the number of records in the XML file after a getElementsByTagName() search
      void loadPage(java.lang.String strURL)
      This function accepts a URL to an XML page and stores it in a Document object.
      java.lang.String setTable(java.lang.String strTable)
      This function looks for a table name in the XML document and returns the first child node.
      void status(java.lang.String strVar)
      This method is just used to display data during testing.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • XMLRead

        public XMLRead()
        The constructor only initializes intRecNum equal to a minus one.

    • Method Detail

      • find

        public int find(java.lang.String strKeyName,
                java.lang.String strKeyContents)
         throws java.lang.Exception
        This function will search for a value represented by strKey in a field indicated by strKeyField.
        • intRecNum is set to a minus one if it did not find the key
        • intRecNum is set to the index number (position) if it did find the key.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getField

        public java.lang.String getField(java.lang.String strFieldName)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        This method extracts the contents of the field at the the current intRecNum position.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getField

        public java.lang.String getField(java.lang.String strField,
                                 int intRec)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        This method sets the current record to intRec and then extracts the contents of that field at that record.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getRecordCount

        public int getRecordCount(java.lang.String strFieldName)
        This method returns the number of records in the XML file after a getElementsByTagName() search

      • loadPage

        public void loadPage(java.lang.String strURL)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        This function accepts a URL to an XML page and stores it in a Document object. The class variable intRecNum is also set to -1.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • setTable

        public java.lang.String setTable(java.lang.String strTable)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        This function looks for a table name in the XML document and returns the first child node.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • status

        public void status(java.lang.String strVar)
        This method is just used to display data during testing.
